categories.name: melanoma
categories.caption: A photo of melanoma, a malignant skin lesion originating from melanocytes, often presenting as an asymmetrical, irregularly bordered area with uneven pigmentation.

categories.name: nevus
categories.caption: A photo of a nevus, a benign pigmented lesion commonly referred to as a mole, typically round or oval with smooth surfaces and uniform coloration.

categories.name: seborrheic_keratosis
categories.caption: A photo of seborrheic keratosis, a benign epidermal growth with a waxy, wart-like appearance and varying colors from pale yellow to dark brown.
